alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 7:06AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central and southern Lake County through 745 AM EST... At 706 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Bushnell, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Eustis, Tavares, Lady Lake and Mount Dora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of funnel clouds. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
